note:
Transformational justice activist. Ally. Progressive. Immigrant. Latino. Here to listen to, learn from, amplify & elevate others. Him/él.

Avatar photo is a picture of me, salt/pepper hair and beard, laughing in a blue shirt with a staircase in the background.

Header is a picture of the Illimani mountain in the background, the city of La Paz, Bolivia in the fore, taken from the city of El Alto. Credit: me.

Culturally bilingual English / español. Happy to communicate in either or both.
